WRITING.TITLE: Swagbucks videos not working?
WRITING.TEXT: A while ago the ncrave videos stopped working for me after quite a few times of watching the playlists but they were still showing on the page, so I ended up just watching the normal playlists. Ive been watching the playlists for a while and all of a sudden when I tried watching another playlist it said unavailable "Sorry this offer is currently unavailable" I deleted all my cookies, tried reseting the internet, tried closing and opening my browser and nothing is working. Is it the site or what is going on? very frustrating since I cant even do that much surveys. Now Ncrave playlists are working again and the normal watch playlists are not.
Its probably to do with the site if its happening to you aswell

WRITING.TITLE: Will they ship items from USA to Canada on Amazon.ca?
WRITING.TEXT: I live in canada and would like to purchase something but I can only get it from the US, can I buy and will they send me my dvd even though I live in Canada?
If you live in canada change the site from Canada to USA and the activate button will appear at the top of the site when you refresh it
Problem solved, it kept taking me to the canadian website so I had to switch the site to USA

WRITING.TITLE: Why did I just get refunded a 5$ and 2 3$ Gift certificates?
WRITING.TEXT: I ordered a 5$ Amazon.ca certificate and two 3$ ones and after waiting for 3 days they refunded me with 1,100 swag bucks

Its all good now, I sent them a message with the order number and the title of my purchase and they got back to me quickly and shipped my order within 7 minutes of getting back to me, great customer service :). This is what they said:
I sincerely apologize for this delay and I hope understand your concern in this regard.
In the meantime I have forwarded your concern to our shipping team to makes sure your future will ship from the nearestfulfillment center and deliver to your address with prime delivery.
I am truly sorry that we were not able to fulfill your expectations for this level of service. I hope that you will honor us with another opportunity to prove the quality of our service to you in the future.
To help make up for the inconvenience caused by the delay, I'll personally follow up with this and once the item gets shipped I'll issue refund for the shipping charges associated with this item.
In addition to a wide selection of items, one of our aims at Amazon.ca is to provide a convenient and efficient service; in this case, we have not met that standard.
Is it just a glitch on their behalf or the website? It says one of my packages are already shipped
Xbox 360, I have live gold aswell

WRITING.TITLE: Rick Baker Speical Fx Artist(The Exorcist, Star Wars, Gremlins 2, Men In Black) Shows Scott Ian around his studio.

WRITING.TEXT:
It's not so much a story its more of a experience. Here are some things a can explain.
The beginning sequence The dot grows incrementally larger, or closer, before shaping itself into a pattern of rings that simultaneously suggests a birth canal dilating, the stages of a rocket separating, and a lunar eclipse as seen through a telescope's lens.This is Johansson's character, falling to earth, or landing on earth.
The man or men on motorcylces are her watchers to make sure she stays on task. When the men get lured to her home which is a pure black void, the black goo is another dimension which their insides are being transported back to their world cause that is what they eat. The motorcyclist kills the guy with the deformed face because she let him go.
There are times when the heroine is a vessel emptied of meaning. Other times she seems like a human struggling to learn the subtle everyday details of a new culture.
When the man tries to have sex with the her, she gets frightened cause their bodys arent compatible and she points the lamp at her alien vag to see if theres any damage and then takes off cause she is confused and upset. The ending just speaks for itself.

WRITING.TITLE: JEEPERS CREEPERS 2: BEHIND THE SCENES
Rob Bottin practical fx artist(The Thing, Se7en, Robocop,Total Recall) Discusses "Sloth" Segment for Se7en

WRITING.TEXT: It said to give the thing a little tug, not to giv'er
